div.p: Specimen type : HL7 v2 table 0487. For ballot: should this rather extracted from LOINC System? but this covers a much wider scope. Or it could be all Snomed descendents of 123038009 (Specimen)
This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0487

description.value: Specimen type : HL7 v2 table 0487. For ballot: should this rather extracted from LOINC System? but this covers a much wider scope. Or it could be all Snomed descendents of 123038009 (Specimen)
